<a id="VisualShaderNodeBooleanConstant"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeBooleanConstant

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeConstant](VisualShaderNodeConstant.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A boolean constant to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Has only one output port and no inputs.

Translated to ``bool`` in the shader language.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
